content.description: Slopey mantle above the Egg start.
Start under the right side of the roof with hands on the nice ledge. Take a clue from the name to make your way back and up to the same finish as The Egg (V4).
content.location:
Start on the obvious ledge, right of The Egg.

The Obscure area is accessible from the main trail. Take the first right after going up the first gulley.

content.description: Some fun and tricky traversing with some committing moves. The top out is pretty sketchy without the use of a key crimp up around the right corner. Crux is moving through the crimps to the sloper.
content.protection: Boulder pads, some not so fun bigger rocks underneath the traverse, somewhat painful.
content.location: To the left side of the egg starts on some lower starting jugs around the corner.

content.description: Start on the low left side of the boulder and make core-intensive moves to traverse right underneath the steep roof on small, but positive edges. Once you get to the corner, where the pedestal out right meets the boulder, top out using some awesome beta trickery. An unsung classic!
content.protection: 6+ pads is nice, since this line traverses quite a bit and there are rocks in the landing zone.
content.location: Located on theÂ Egg boulder, just down the hill from Leprechaun Roof.
